## Paper Information

- **Title**: [Paper title]
- **Authors**: [Authors]
- **Year**: [Publication year]
- **Venue**: [Conference/Journal]
- **Link**: [arXiv or paper URL]

## Motivation

Why should this paper be implemented? What makes it foundational or important?

## Scope

What aspects of the paper should be implemented?

- [ ] Core algorithm
- [ ] Training procedure
- [ ] Evaluation metrics
- [ ] Experiments from paper

## Implementation Notes

Any specific considerations for implementing this paper in Mojo:

- Performance requirements
- Memory constraints
- Dependencies on other papers/components

## Success Criteria

- [ ] Matches paper's reported results
- [ ] Comprehensive test coverage
- [ ] Performance benchmarks
- [ ] Documentation complete
